lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 29 points, and Kevin Love and Kyrie Irving each added 21 as Cleveland took down the Spurs, winning its fourth straight under Coach Tyronn Lue.
snippet: LeBron James scored 29 points, and Kevin Love and Kyrie Irving each added 21 as Cleveland took down the Spurs, winning its fourth straight under Coach Tyronn Lue.

headline.print_headline: Cavaliers Finally Beat a Top Rival

abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers defeat San Antonio Spurs, 117-103; other basketball scores noted.
